content: I don't have the ability to assess the effectiveness of the actions taken by authorities in alleviating traffic congestion in general santos city since i don't have access to the latest data on the extent of the congestion and the results of the measures implemented. however, the actions mentioned are some of the common strategies that have been known to work in other cities. it's worth noting that the effectiveness of these measures may vary depending on several factors such as the city's geographical layout, population density, level of cooperation among drivers, and public transport efficiency. to determine their effectiveness, regular monitoring and evaluation of their impact may be necessary, and adjustments may be made as needed.
